summary: Changes the Mage, Thief, and Warrior stone abilities to fortify Magicka, Stamina, and Health respectively instead.
descriptionHtml:
This is just a minor tweak in that the Mage standing stone fortifies Magicka by 50 points, the Thief fortifies Stamina by 50 points, and the Warrior fortifies Health by 50 points. I disliked hose stones basically being Skyrim\'s equivalent to \"Class Specialization\" like Oblivion\'s class system had. Considering I have other ideas for modifying skill advance rates I needed to change these three stones.

I also changes associated texts and loading screens to reflect these changes.
author: Christchex
